comments.body: How does feature get turned on/off?
You enable it with `--admission-control=ImagePolicyWebhook` like the other admission controllers
Is that a csv in the CLI? And does the URL need to be set in the config file, or can I set it via an environment variable?

It is CSV via the CLI, see: http://kubernetes.io/docs/admin/admission-controllers/#how-do-i-turn-on-an-admission-control-plug-in (and example at the bottom)

The URL currently needs to be set in the config file, yes. I think that makes the most sense since you also need to configure the certs.
